name: Hunchback
overview:
Rescue Esmerelda from her castle stronghold. Featuring: The Ramparts, Knights, Arrows, Fireballs, the Pit and of course the Bells!

100% machine code, just like the Arcade.

Quasimodo must rescue the imprisoned Esmerelda from the castle stronghold. Jump along the Ramparts, swing over the Fiery pit, dodge the Arrows and Fireballs. 15 screens of fun and excitement and each one more difficult than the last.
